gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.openurl

Class SimpleListResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.openurl.SimpleListResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReferentResolver

    public class SimpleListResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements IReferentResolver
    Default IReferentResolver implementation that uses a tab delimited file to define the association between rft_id and file path. The imgIndexFile should be defined in the OpenURLJP2KService.properties file as SimpleListResolver.imgIndexFile. Property: SimpleListResolver.imgIndexFile=imgIndex.txt Format: rft_id\tfile_path
    Author:
    Ryan Chute
